title: client keeps crashing in ranked champ select randomly.
body:
the client keeps crashing at random times.... it will freeze, then go white then won't respond...

tired of getting lpq and loss of lp.

what could be the problem.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds odd. 

* Are you disconnecting when this happens (Losing connection to your network)
* Have you attempted to initiate a client repair. This can be done from the login screen or within the client itself by clicking the gear icon and then clicking "Initiate full repair"

no , the client will freeze then i will click on it and it won't respond.

ill try that now
